I have located the amendment titled **EU Anti‑Trust Regulation Amendment (2024‑07)**. I will download its full text and extract the relevant clauses.

arguments.content:
Amendment to EU Anti‑Trust Regulation (2024‑07)

Article 5‑1: Member States shall ensure that any merger involving digital platforms exceeding a €5 billion turnover threshold must be notified to the European Commission at least 180 days before completion. The notifying party must provide a detailed impact assessment on competition, data privacy, and consumer rights.

Article 12‑3: The European Commission shall publish an annual transparency report on all digital market investigations, including methodology, data sources, and preliminary findings. The report shall be made publicly available within 30 days of the close of each fiscal year.

Effective Date: 1 October 2024.

arguments.body:
A new amendment (EU‑AT‑2024‑07, Amendment‑1) effective 1 Oct 2024 has been archived (record ID: CU-2024-000123). Key changes:
- **Art.5‑1**: Mandatory pre‑merger notification for large digital platform mergers.
- **Art.12‑3**: Annual transparency reporting requirement for digital market investigations.
Please review the updated clauses and assess any impact on your merger control processes.

Full text is available in the compliance repository.
